sn45.69:4.3: A mendicant accomplished in rational attention can expect to
sn45.69:4.4: develop and cultivate the noble eightfold path.
sn45.69:4.5: And how does a mendicant accomplished in rational attention develop and cultivate the noble eightfold path?
sn45.69:4.6: It’s when a mendicant develops right view, right motivation, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness,
sn45.69:4.7: and right samādhi, which relies on seclusion, fading away, and cessation, and ripens as letting go.
sn45.69:4.8: That’s how a mendicant accomplished in rational attention develops and cultivates the noble eightfold path.”
